text: D-Day the Sixth of June is a 1956 American World War II romance movie directed by Henry Koster and was based on the 1955 novel The Sixth of June by Lionel Shapiro. It stars Robert Taylor, Richard Todd, Dana Wynter, Edmund O'Brien, Robert Gist, Richard Stapley and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1956 romance movies Category:1956 war movies Category:American war movies Category:1950s American romance movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Henry Koster
title: D-Day the Sixth of June
